name: AQUALAND
description:
Movement of the player: based on the camera movement (animation)

with WSAD camera direction

Genre: Action, Adventure, Platformer

Players: 1

Console: keyboard, mouse

Duration: 5 mins

Research Question:

Q: How much of the ocean have we explored?

A: To date, we have explored approximately 5 percent of the ocean.

 

Why ocean?

  • I love sea, diving, exploring the ocean
  • There are thousand species of sea creatures but we actually explored a small part of it
  • Hope to know more the undefined animals
  • Infinite imaginary space

The project is an underwater world exploration and played from a first-person perspective.  The scenario is mainly built by low-poly models. You may browse the sea by keyboard and mouse.
